name: Blueberry Rhubarb Crumble
instructions: For crust in large bowl combine oats, brown sugar, and the 1/2 c. flour.
Cut butter into oat mix until it resembles coarse crumbs.
Reserve 2/3 c. crumb mix for topping.
Pat remaining crumb mix into the bottom of a greased 9x9” pan.
Bake at 350 for 10-15 minutes or until light brown.
Meanwhile, for filling in a large mixing bowl combine the blueberries and the rhubarb.
Add the sugar and 2 T. flour; toss to coat well.
Bake at 350 for 45-50 minutes or until golden.
